name: Laser Drone
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #71

Theme: LASERS

You've been tasked with stealing from a museum. Get to the target area as fast as possible and try to avoid the lasers.

R to restart. Other controls explained in game.

All assets, including audio and drone model were made by myself within the 3 hours. I started out with Unreal Engines "flying" example though...
